hadiths.text: The above mentioned tradition has been reported by ‘Ikramah with a different chain of narrators. This version adds:When he stood up, he said the takbir (Allah is most great) and said

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُسْتَفْتَحُ بِهِ الصَّلاَةُ مِنَ الدُّعَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: The Supplication With Which The Prayer Should Be Started
